snippet.title: My Indie Roguelite Shooter Now Has a Name (and a Steam Page!) - Gunforged Devlog 10
snippet.description:
🕹️ Wishlist Gunforged on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2258480/Gunforged/

Artists featured in this video:
Trampiton: https://www.behance.net/trampiton
Luanmaximino: https://www.behance.net/luanmaximino

📰 Sign up for my newsletter: https://firebelley.com

📖 Learn Godot with my Udemy course: https://www.udemy.com/course/create-a-complete-2d-platformer-in-the-godot-engine/?referralCode=A2180102813715F70D75

🎮 Pick up one of my games:
https://store.steampowered.com/search/?sort_by=_ASC&developer=Firebelley
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1330940/Sword_Slinger/
https://firebelley.itch.io/sword-slinger

➡️ Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/firebelley
➡️ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Firebelley
➡️ Itch.io: https://firebelley.itch.io/

In this devlog for my indie roguelite shooter I announce the final name and the release of the Steam store page! I also cover all of the other changes that were made to the game, including level and visual improvements, new enemy types, and more!

#godot #gamedev
